Won't work on PS3 or WD TV Media Player. Trying MKVmerge to remux without compression headers. Hopefully that works.

Anyone having issues with this file, use MKVmerge to remux. On the video file, audio file, and subtitles, click the "Extra Options" tab and set compression to "none". 

After remuxing, it works fine for me.
